body.name: Hand Crafted Solid Wood Accent Table, Side Table, Entryway Table, Hand Carved Vintage Boho Folding Side Table, Unique Octagonal Wooden Table - 12 Inch Round - Antique White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 39 mins
features: CONSTRUCTION: Measures 12 Inches Round Top x 12 Inches High pillar
HANDCRAFTED QUALITY: Carved from 100% Seasoned Solid Mango wood by Reliable & Durable Indian Authentic Handicrafts With Antique Rural Artwork Handcrafted, Handpainted by village Artisans In India.
EASY ASSEMBLY : Octagonal side table comes in a flat package box containing 1 round table top and 1 octangle base. The assembly is very easy and no need for any special tool to use.

PERFECT GIFT CHOICE : These tables are a great way to decorate your living room, dinign room, hallway, entryway, office. Makes a great hostess gift for Thanksgiving, Christmas, Mother's Day, birthdays, new year, halloween, easter, holiday, or housewarming.

MULTIPURPOSE USE - Round end table for the living room, and in the bedroom as a nightstand are more popular recently. Also can be used as a coffee table, make-up table, snack table, tea table, decor table, and small side table for small spaces.Useful for home, bedroom, living room, options for outdoor space garden or courtyard.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: As a brand Goroly Home is passionate about providing home textiles and home furnishing products that help people bring comfort, styles and designs to their home and office. We provide a vast range of products from Textile’s products, Wooden handicrafts and more. Our manufacturing is in India where we manufacture Beach Towels, Floor Coverings, Kitchen towels, Dinner Napkins, Window curtains and valances, Bed Linens, Bath Rugs and Mats, Holiday Items, Bag and Baskets, Napkin Rings, Table Runners, Table placemats and various other textiles items.

We are manufacturing products within our premises so we have control on each stage.We have quality control on each and every stage to control any defects while production or finishing and packing.We love to take feedbacks from customers and implements corrective measures to gain more confidence of customers.Color Disclaimer : Actual product color may vary from the images shown. Every monitor or mobile display has a different capability to display colors, and every individual may see these colors differently. In addition, lighting conditions at the time the photo was taken can also affect an image's color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This table is great. So easy to put together, just 3 pieces. Very sturdy and very well made, a good size too. The carving on the top is so cute, little flowers. All around great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little table is beautifully crafted. I purchased 2 of them. The first went together smoothly. The second I had to wrestle with a bit and almost returned the item. Luckily with a bit of stubbornness I was able to get the top to connect to the hand carved base. The table is solid and beautiful. If the table is no longer in use it folds up and is easy to store with minimal space taken up. The table is small and perfect for a little office or low end table

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ni reemplazo ni devolución
reviews.reviewText: Compré dos mesitas, son muy bonitas y adecuadas para el rincón que las necesito, pero una de ellas vino rota. Solicité el reemplazo de la que vino rota y hubo problemas con el envío y nunca efectuaron la entrega, por lo que cancelé el pedido.El asunto es que ni he recibido la nueva mesa en sustitución de la rota ni me han efectuado el reembolso y ha sido prácticamente imposible ponerme en contacto con ustedes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality excellent. Color goes beautifully with my decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, very easy to assemble.It’s a little wobbly. They only have 3 furniture pads on the bottom, so you’ll have to add one or two more to sturdy it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique Side Table
reviews.reviewText: A unique side table that looks exactly like pictured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice, inexpensive hand carved end table, with poor finish (easy to fix)
reviews.reviewText: It is pretty nice, esp for the money. Apparently hand made, with some nice hand-carvings on the top.My dislikes were:1) Made out off some cheap wood (allegedly mango wood, not much grain or natural color) .2) The stain they put on it looks horrible. Looks like it is smeared with something unpleasant.Some other reviewers complain it looks cheap.. well, to be fair, it IS cheap.I ended up sanding the whole thing, refinished with teak oil and then sprayed on some black lacquer from a can. Took almost a whole spray can per table, 2 cans did 3. Once the black lacquer dried, gave it a few coats of spar urethane (wipe on poly).Now it looks rather nice. The sprayed on finish comes close to Piano-black. I think is is best to use a solid color, there is not much nice wood grain to show off.I used Rust-Oleum 1905830 11 oz. from HD. It is rather soft, will not stand up to heavy wear, so a glass top or a protective coating of spar urethane may be useful, or just touch it up as needed.If you are willing to do some light refinishing, you will end up with a rather nice end table, for rather reasonable money. See picture of how it looks refinished.I though it would be nice to have some extra weight in the base, (like a bag of buckshot) , but surprisingly it is not very tippy as it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Buy it Already!
reviews.reviewText: Probably one of the best things I've bought in all my years of Amazon shopping! I couldn't believe how unbelievably easy this was to out together - just screw the 3 pieces together. The table was even more adorable in person. It is small in diameter, but is the perfect size to enjoy a glass of wine or a cup of coffee.
This is solid wood assembled in 5 minutes looks amazing

I am REALLY impressed with this item. The workmanship and effort to build this piece is outstanding. The price is also outstanding. I could not help but think of how much the craftsman would have been paid for his/her efforts. I am humbled when I think of that but rest assured it has brought a warmth to our home and it will be treasured. I will always buy from a country that has a democracy, no matter how chaotic! I ALWAYS check the source...thank you India, I hope your lives prosper in the future. Keep up the good work providing such wonderful products.
